name: PewPew (itch) (HaleyBellArt)
description:
A short runnin' and gunnin' 2D PC side-scroller! You play Minty the alien. It's been a long day at work and you'd love to go home. Collect the flags from all four levels and get home safe! 

I coded and drew all content. Full credits for fonts, music, sfx, and more located inside game. 

This game uses mouse and keyboard to play.
